personalInfo.name: Naveen Chelo
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer
personalInfo.summary: Frontend Developer with 3 years of experience at Tata Consultancy Services, specializing in building responsive and scalable web applications using Angular (v17+), TypeScript, and NgRx. Proficient in micro front-end architecture, state management, and reusable UI component library development. Known for writing clean, maintainable code, optimizing performance, and collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.

clients.name: NEST UK
achievements: Led design and development of critical modules for a large-scale pension management platform using Angular 17, NgRx, and Native Federation, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices
Engineered shell and module connections within a micro front-end architecture, enabling seamless integration of distinct Angular microservices and improving modular deployment capabilities
Implemented robust NgRx state management (stores, reducers, actions, effects), optimizing data handling and reducing API call frequency, enhancing UI responsiveness
Developed and maintained a reusable UI component library with Angular Material and Sass, leading to a significant decrease in frontend development time for new features
Ensured optimal responsive design (CSS Grid, Flexbox) with high fidelity to Figma mockups, collaborating closely with UX designers to resolve UI inconsistencies
Mentored junior developers in Angular best practices and conducted KT sessions, improving team code quality and accelerating new member onboarding
Optimized application performance by identifying and refactoring critical bottlenecks, significantly improving scalability and maintainability
Gained practical experience with AWS backend services and contributed to the understanding and implementation of CI/CD pipelines for application deployment

clients.name: CVS Pharmacy
achievements: Developed and implemented key user experience (UX) and UI requirements for a customer-facing pharmacy portal, building reusable Angular components, directives, and services
Engineered services for seamless data integration from multiple REST APIs, efficiently handled bug fixes, and managed deployments to staging, ensuring application stability
Collaborated closely with Team Leads and Business Analysts to meticulously define requirements, contributing to a notable reduction in development errors and rework
Actively participated in UI design discussions and implementation, enhancing team technical skills through shared learning sessions and promoting user-centric design

projects.title: Micro-Frontend Financial Retail Hub
projects.description: Developing a comprehensive micro-frontend application comprising a feature-rich banking module and an interactive retail e-commerce module, orchestrated via a shell application.
projects.longDescription: This project demonstrates advanced micro-frontend architecture using Angular and Native Federation. The application consists of multiple independently deployable micro-apps that communicate seamlessly through a shell application. The banking module handles financial transactions and account management, while the retail module provides e-commerce functionality. Both modules utilize NgRx for state management and are designed to work independently or as part of the larger ecosystem.
highlights: Independent deployment of banking and retail modules

projects.title: NEST UK Pension Management Platform
projects.description: Critical modules for a large-scale pension management platform serving millions of users across the UK.
projects.longDescription: As part of the NEST UK team, I contributed to building and maintaining critical modules for one of the UK's largest pension management platforms. The project involved complex state management, micro-frontend architecture, and seamless integration with multiple backend services. The platform handles sensitive financial data and requires high performance, security, and scalability.

projects.title: CVS Pharmacy Customer Portal
projects.description: Customer-facing pharmacy portal with comprehensive UX/UI features for prescription management and healthcare services.
projects.longDescription: Developed key components for CVS Pharmacy's customer portal, focusing on user experience and seamless integration with multiple healthcare APIs. The project involved creating reusable Angular components, implementing responsive design principles, and ensuring HIPAA compliance for healthcare data handling.

projects.title: Angular Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Angular, NgRx, and deployed on GitHub Pages.
projects.longDescription: A showcase portfolio website demonstrating modern Angular development practices, including NgRx state management, sandbox pattern, and responsive design. The site features smooth animations, optimized performance, and follows Angular best practices for maintainable code architecture.

achievements.title: Best Performer Award
achievements.description: Recognized for exceptional performance in Angular development and team collaboration

achievements.title: Innovation Award
achievements.description: Awarded for implementing innovative micro-frontend architecture solutions

achievements.title: Mentor of the Year
achievements.description: Recognized for mentoring junior developers and conducting knowledge transfer sessions

testimonials.name: Team Lead
testimonials.text: Naveen consistently delivers high-quality Angular solutions and has been instrumental in our micro-frontend architecture implementation.

testimonials.name: Senior Developer
testimonials.text: Excellent collaboration skills and deep understanding of Angular best practices. A valuable team member.

seoMeta.title: Naveen Chelo - Frontend Developer | Angular Specialist
seoMeta.description: Experienced Frontend Developer specializing in Angular, NgRx, and modern web technologies. 3+ years at TCS building scalable web applications.
seoMeta.keywords: Angular Developer, Frontend Developer, NgRx, TypeScript, JavaScript, Micro Frontend, TCS, Bengaluru
